name: Fishing Fever (vaglo)
description:
Sail around an island and get as many fish as possible!

Paddle up to the BLUE fishing holes and press SPACE to collect fish when the red line is over the green line.
Return to the RED dock to drop off the collected fish.
However, the LESS fish that is in the boat the MORE speed you will have

Collect POWERUPS dotted around the map.
FISH powerup: Add a random amount of fish to the ship and the docked fish
HOLE powerup: Spawn more fishing holes around the map
SPEED powerup: Increase your speed to max regardless how many fish are in your boat

Press R to restart and P to reset high score

Use W and S to move forward and A and D to turn.
Have fun!

Code: mine
Models: mine
Sound Effects: mine
Music: Air Hockey Saloon | Chris Zabriskie

- For the Black Thorn Prod Game Jam
